Bug.Bug_Name: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new user
Bug.Description: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new the user, hence unable to create a new user in the application
Bug.Steps: <1)> Login into the Application</1)> <2)> Navigate to the Users Menu -> New User"</2)> <3)> Filled out all the user information fields"</3)> <4)> Clicked on the ‘Save’ button"</4)> <5)> Seen an error page</5>
Bug.Expected: On clicking the SAVE button, you should be prompted to a successful message “New User has been created successfully"
